Title: Yuuki no Hana ga Hiraku Toki: Yanase Takashi to Anpanman no Monogatari
Description: ['A biographical anime about ', Sore Ike! Anpanman, " creator Takashi Yanase, based on Kumiko Kakehashi's novel of the same name, and celebrates what would have been the 100th birthday of the manga creator."]
